articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Bahrain names GCC chief country's new foreign minister
articles.description: The state-run Bahrain New Agency is reporting that Bahrain has appointed the head of the six-nation Gulf Cooperation Council as the country's next foreign minister
articles.content:
Hell be replacing Sheikh Khalid bin Ahmed Al Khalifa, whos been Bahrains foreign minister since 2005. Al Khalifa, who confirmed the news on Twitter and congratulated al-Zayani, will serve as diplomatic adviser to the king.

articles.author: Hau Chu
articles.title: One of the heaviest-sounding bands in D.C. found an unlikely influence for its latest album
articles.description: Red Death embraced the metal sounds from bands such as Metallica, as well as classical music.
articles.content: Vocalist Chad Troncale sounds as powerfully brutish as ever, while guitar shredder Ace Mendoza effortlessly beams out blistering solos that echo in your head amid the assured cacophony. Drummer Connor Donegan and guitarist Will Wagstaff provide a steadying ha… [+2896 chars]

articles.author: Miriam Berger
articles.title: Australia's prime minister visited families devastated by the wildfires. It did not go well.
articles.description: "What about the people who are dead, prime minister," shouted one resident of a fire-hit town, raw with emotions. "What about the people who have nowhere to live?"
articles.content:
How come we only had four trucks to defend our town? Because our town doesnt have a lot of money but we have hearts of gold, prime minister, one woman in a Led Zeppelin T-shirt walking a goat shouted at the prime minister.
What about the people who are dead,… [+3695 chars]

Castro, who did not qualify for the past two Democratic debates because he failed to rank high enough in pre-debate polls, noted in the video that there was only a month left before the Iowa caucuses, which will be held Feb. 3.

articles.title: Mexico is giving millions of workers a historic pay increase. But will it have much effect?
